eventAdvice: Don't miss the upcoming most anticipated events
selectDateTime: Select the date and time when the event will take place.
selectImageDescription: Select the image you want to display at the event.
eventInfoDescription: Select the name, date and time when the event will take place.
eventDescriptionDescription: Use this space to tell the public about the details of your event. Be sure to include any relevant information that helps them understand the essence of the event and motivates them to participate.
eventLocationDescription: Specify the exact location where your event will be held. This information will help attendees plan their visit in advance.
eventPriceDescription: Specify whether your event will be free or paid. If it is paid, please indicate the cost of admission.
